about_the_game:
THE GAMEPLAY

You've been hired by a mysterious truck driver with one simple mission: assemble your team, venture into eerie, abandoned locations, and gather enough valuable loot to meet up to three cash quotas before the clock runs out. In this online co-op survival horror experience, failure means no payday, and every decision counts as you race against the clock to scavenge, survive, and cash out.

You'll have to use a range of tools to navigate crumbling structures and dark corridors, but stay alert—danger lurks in every shadow. As you explore, you’ll encounter unpredictable threats, from environmental hazards to hostile forces that will stop at nothing to keep you from your prize.

Stay together, strategize carefully, and keep an eye on the clock. Will you meet the quota, or end up empty-handed?

[

BRING YOUR TOOLS AND FRIENDS

If you have friends who could use some extra money, they are welcome to join the crew. The more people you have, the faster you can complete the task, which will reduce the risk of accidents.

During the job, it's very important to use the proper tools and equipment, which you can purchase from the truck with the wages you've earned by then. Of course, you'll need to provide your own basic protective gear, as the driver won't take responsibility for any injuries.

THE TRUCK

Equipped with the latest groundbreaking technologies, the team’s truck is one of the most advanced mobile work centers today. It features a tool shop, a dedicated company intranet hub, a computer network necessary for job assignments, a first aid kit (currently empty but in the process of being restocked), as well as lockers for storing clothing and protective gear. To the driver, the comfort of the workers is just as important as their safety and health!

name: Clueless Crew

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Scavenge through abandoned locations with your friends, buy tools, and venture further into eerie corridors and rooms filled with monsters and ghosts, then haul the loot back to the truck before dawn.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
